name: Instagram grid
description:
• Arrange photos in Instagram feed in a grid;
  • Fit more photos in a row on user profile page (and make profile page wider);
  • (Optionally) Hide #tags and/or comments in a feed;
  • (Optionally) Remove spacing between photos on a profile page.
additional_info: 28.07.2017: * Fixed heeader after some layout update on Instagram side 17.06.2017: * Remove additional empty space on top of pages * Fix for tags and comments hiding * Remove an ability to reverse controls order as Instagram now reverses it by default * Remove an ability to make discover page wider 04.03.2017: * Fix elements order 01.03.2017: * Quick fix for slightly updated Instagram layout 26.02.2017: * Update screenshots 15.10.2016: * Fix the whole thing after userstyles.org fucks up the latest release * Code available on Github 25.08.2016: * Fixed grid on location page + Enhanced discover page (optional, disabled by default) 14.08.2016: * Fixed grid in search results * Screenshots are updated 06.08.2016: * Removed side margins on profile page when “Spacing between photos on profile pages” is set to “Hide spacing” 05.08.2016: * Removed an ability to display 9 photos in a row, because it results in a problem described here * Removed flexible width of photos in a feed, because it produces ugly bugs sometimes * Updated screenshots + Added an ability to disable spacing between photos on user profile pages + Added an ability to move controls (like button and new commment input field) right under photos in feed 29.07.2016: + Added some responsiveness to user profile pages. Also, it fixes this bug 16.07.2016: * Options to hide comments and tags should hide them in a feed and not on a photo page 15.07.2016: * Fixed header size 14.07.2016: + Added an option to hide comments in Instagram feed 07.07.2016: * Fixed an ability to hide tags in Instagram feed after another layout update on Instagram side 05.07.2016: * Fixed multiple bugs in grid arrangement. All photos in a grid should be exact the same size now. 05.06.2016: + Added an option to hide #tags in Instagram feed as requested here 13.05.2016: + Added popup menu styles 11.05.2016: * Updated with support of new Instagram design
